system.effect: A massive machine allowing plant life inside it to grow up to a hundred times faster. Ship crew never suffer starvation or malnturition effects, also gain permenant +5 Morale, and +10 Bonus to Medicae Tests to diagnose and contain shipboard sickness. Requires one day and -20 Forbidden Lore (Archeotech) Test to install on a ship. This component is a one of a kind relic, it cannot be acquired, and must be earned. Last seen in a deadly jungle of its own making...
